sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conduct SQD STX NLT 10DEC2024 on PA254 and PA251 IOT prepare and certify for following LFX training.
Day 1: SQD Movement to Contact
Tactical
sections.TASKS:
1) Planning and Orders Process
2) Leaders Recon
3) Squad Attack
4) Exfill
